channel.title: Autoinhibitor on RD's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Autoinhibitor on RD's Blog

item.title: Activation of a Ca2+-dependent Protein Kinase Involves Intramolecular Binding of a Calmodulin-like Regulatory Domain
item.description: Notes on a 1996 Biochemistry paper revealing that activation of CDPK involves intramolecular binding between its calmodulin-like domain (CaM-LD) and junction/autoinhibitor, offering deep insights into Ca2+-regulated protein kinase activation.
